spheroRvr: Control A Sphero RVR Using these Commands
spheroRvr.drive: Drive with a Heading from 0 to 359 and a speed from -255 to +255
spheroRvr.raw_motors: Manually control the left and right motors
spheroRvr.set_all_leds: Set all RGB LEDs on the RVR to one RGB value
spheroRvr.set_rgb_led_by_index: Set one individual RGB LED on the RVR to a specific RGB value
spheroRvr.set_undercarriage_white_led: Set the intensity of the RVR's white undercarriage LED.
